subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: At Nuggets’ practice on Tuesday morning, Allen Iverson was preparing for his second game with his new team and Carmelo Anthony was counting the days until Jan. 22, when he can return from his suspension.
snippet: At Nuggets’ practice on Tuesday morning, Allen Iverson was preparing for his second game with his new team and Carmelo Anthony was counting the days until Jan. 22, when he can return from his suspension.
